Customers∵

A Customer resource represents a business or person. Card and BankAccount resources may be associated to a Customer.


Available Query Filters
created_at

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

email

Available Operations: =, !=, startswith, endswith, contains, !contains, in, !in, ilike, !ilike

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

meta

Available Operations: contains, !contains

Default Operation: contains

Sortable: False

roles

Available Operations: contains, !contains, in, !in

Default Operation: contains

Sortable: False

Create a Customer∵

Create a new Customer. When the business_name and ein parameters are supplied, the Customer will be treated as a business.

address

optional object.

city
optional string. City of the person or business.
line2
optional string. Second line of the address for the person or business.
line1
optional string. Street address of the person or business.
state
optional string. State of the person or business.
postal_code
optional string. Postal code/zip code of the person or business.
country_code
optional string. Two character country code.
business_name
optional string. Full business name if the customer is a business. If there is a business name and EIN present, the customer will be treated as a business instead of a person.
dob_month
optional integer. Date of birth month of the customer or representative of the business.
dob_year
optional integer. Date of birth year of the customer or representative of the business.
ein
optional string. Employee Identification Number of the business if the customer is a business. If there is a business name and EIN present, the customer will be treated as a business instead of a person.
email
optional string. Email address of the customer.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.
name
optional string. Name of the customer or representative of the business.
phone
optional string. Phone number of the person or business.
source
optional string.
ssn_last4
optional string. Last four digits of the Social Security Number of the customer or representative of the business.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers

Balanced::Customer.new

balanced.Customer().save()

balanced.marketplace.customers.create()

Customer(Map<String, Object> payload)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->customers->create()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "name=Henry Ford" \
     -d "dob_year=1963" \
     -d "dob_month=7" \
     -d "address[postal_code]=48120"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

customer = Balanced::Customer.new(
  :address => {
    :postal_code => '48120'
  },
  :dob_month => 7,
  :dob_year => 1963,
  :name => 'Henry Ford'
)
customer.save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

customer = balanced.Customer(
    dob_year=1963,
    dob_month=7,
    name='Henry Ford',
    address={
        'postal_code': '48120'
    }
).save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.customers.create({
    "address": {
        "postal_code": "48120"
    }, 
    "name": "Henry Ford", 
    "dob_year": 1963, 
    "dob_month": 7
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Map<String, Object> address = new HashMap<String, Object>();
address.put("postal_code", "48120");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("name", "Henry Ford");
payload.put("dob_month", 7);
payload.put("dob_year", 1963);
payload.put("address", address);

Customer customer = new Customer(payload);

try {
    customer.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$customer = $marketplace->customers->create(array(
    "address" => "Array",
    "dob_month" => "7",
    "dob_year" => "1963",
    "name" => "Henry Ford",
));

?>

Example Response

Fetch a Customer∵

Fetch the details of a previously created Customer.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers/:customer_id

Balanced::Customer.fetch

balanced.Customer.fetch()

balanced.get()

Customer(String uri)

Balanced\Customer::get()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers/CU50VDinhVHYSqWcptqE2cvK \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

customer = Balanced::Customer.fetch('/customers/CU7Ax7eQc4DJfYM0Wt3MqtHW')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

customer = balanced.Customer.fetch('/customers/CU5YopHN07Ul5XQnILUifeQT')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/customers/CU50VDinhVHYSqWcptqE2cvK')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Customer customer = new Customer("/customers/CU4xpIqZ7mf2fuLpBoXgoG7m");

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

Balanced\Customer::get("/customers/CU3pCvOdgy2r0TIQ67xuSREr");

?>

List all Customers∵

Fetch a list of all previously created customers. The customers are returned in sorted order, with the most recent customers appearing first.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers

Balanced::Customer.all

balanced.Customer.query

balanced.marketplace.customers

Customer.Collection(String href)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->customers

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

customers = Balanced::Customer.all

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

customers = balanced.Customer.query

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.customers

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Customer.Collection customers = new Customer.Collection(Customer.resource_href);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketpalce = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$marketplace->customers->query()->all();

?>

Update a Customer∵

Update the details of a previously created Customer.

address

optional object.

postal_code
optional string. Postal code/zip code of the person or business.
dob_month
optional integer. Date of birth month of the customer or representative of the business.
dob_year
optional integer. Date of birth year of the customer or representative of the business.
email
optional string. Email address of the customer.
name
optional string. Name of the customer or representative of the business.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers/:customer_id

Balanced::Customer.save

balanced.Customer().save()

balanced.get().save()

Customer().save()

Balanced\Customer->save()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers/CU50VDinhVHYSqWcptqE2cvK \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "email=email@newdomain.com" \
     -d "meta[shipping-preference]=ground"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

customer = Balanced::Customer.fetch('/customers/CU7Ax7eQc4DJfYM0Wt3MqtHW')
customer.email = 'email@newdomain.com'
customer.meta = {
    'shipping-preference' => 'ground'
}
customer.save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

customer = balanced.Debit.fetch('/customers/CU5YopHN07Ul5XQnILUifeQT')
customer.email = 'email@newdomain.com'
customer.meta = {
  'shipping-preference': 'ground'
}
customer.save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/customers/CU50VDinhVHYSqWcptqE2cvK')
    .set('name', 'alan turing')
    .set('email', '123@example.com')
    .save()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Customer customer = new Customer("/customers/CU4xpIqZ7mf2fuLpBoXgoG7m");

Map<String, String> meta = new HashMap<String, String>();
meta.put("shipping-preference", "ground");

customer.meta = meta;
customer.email = "email@newdomain.com";

try {
    customer.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$customer = Balanced\Customer::get("/customers/CU3pCvOdgy2r0TIQ67xuSREr");
$cusotmer->email = 'email@newdomain.com';
$customer->meta = array(
    "shipping-preference" => "ground",
);
$customer->save();

?>

            "email": "email@newdomain.com", 
            "href": "/customers/CU50VDinhVHYSqWcptqE2cvK",

            "links": {
                "destination": null, 
                "source": null
            }, 
            "merchant_status": "underwritten", 
            "meta": {
                "shipping-preference": "ground"
            }, 
            "name": "Henry Ford",

    "links": {
        "customers.bank_accounts": "/customers/{customers.id}/bank_accounts", 
        "customers.card_holds": "/customers/{customers.id}/card_holds",

        "customers.credits": "/customers/{customers.id}/credits",

        "customers.external_accounts": "/customers/{customers.id}/external_accounts",

        "customers.source": "/resources/{customers.source}", 
        "customers.transactions": "/customers/{customers.id}/transactions"
    }
}

Delete a Customer∵

Permanently delete a customer.

note

Only customers without transactions can be deleted.

Deleting a Customer is permanent and cannot be undone.

Definition

DELETE https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers/:customer_id

Balanced::Customer.unstore

balanced.Customer().unstore()

balanced.get().unstore()

Customer().unstore()

Balanced\Customer()->unstore()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/customers/CU5763NnQG26UvqOxKsorsiQ \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X DELETE

customer = Balanced::Customer.fetch('/customers/CU7HlonBKQXhBkwRJdO2kZen')
customer.unstore

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

customer = balanced.Customer.fetch('/customers/CU64R7DS6DwuXYVg9RTskFK8')
customer.unstore()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/customers/CU5763NnQG26UvqOxKsorsiQ').unstore()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Customer customer = new Customer("/customers/CU4EeI9UPzRcOo2C3j1qFjQj");

try {
    customer.unstore();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}
catch (NotCreated e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$customer = Balanced\Customer::get("/customers/CU3veCwC1nqk9GV6dfSkRHRS");
$customer->unstore();


?>

Associate a Card∵

Add a Card to a specific Customer. Multiple cards may be associated to a customer.

note
Once a Card has been associated to a Customer, it cannot be associated to another Customer.
expiration_month
required integer. Expiration month (e.g. 1 for January).
expiration_year
required integer. Expiration year.
number
required string. The digits of the credit card number.
address

optional object.

city
optional string. City of the person or business.
line2
optional string. Second line of the address for the person or business.
line1
optional string. Street address of the person or business.
state
optional string. State of the person or business.
postal_code
optional string. Postal code/zip code of the person or business.
country_code
optional string. Two character country code.
customer
optional string. The customer this card is associated to
cvv
optional string. The 3-4 digit security code for the card.
name
optional string. Customer's name on card

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/:card_id

Balanced::Card.associate_to_customer

balanced.Card().associate_to_customer()

balanced.get().associate_to_customer()

Card().associateToCustomer(Customer customer)

Balanced\Card->associateToCustomer()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/cards/CC4N9xGpzdxJ3W5WWdPOqrQX \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "customer=/customers/CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

card = Balanced::Card.fetch('/cards/CC7mV4UKT6jJOh6nerLFvHJu')
card.associate_to_customer('/customers/CU6Puxkmu24SfVbY0oi1fPLw')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card = balanced.Card.fetch('/cards/CC68IoCVpoFlkugB7xt52p8C')
card.associate_to_customer('/customers/CU64R7DS6DwuXYVg9RTskFK8')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/cards/CC4N9xGpzdxJ3W5WWdPOqrQX')
    .associate_to_customer('/customers/CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Customer customer = new Customer("");
Card card = new Card("/cards/CC4GOYzOKyWXBzJMVTs00aNk");

try {
    card.associateToCustomer(customer);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/cards/CC3yyHvHx0IkXJa7oxUUHxc6");
$card->associateToCustomer("/customers/CU3veCwC1nqk9GV6dfSkRHRS");

?>

Associate a Bank Account∵

Add a BankAccount to a specific Customer. Multiple BankAccount``s may be associated to a ``Customer.

note
Once a BankAccount has been associated to a Customer, it cannot be associated to another Customer.
account_number
required string. Masked account number.
account_type
required string. checking or savings.
name
required string. Name of the account holder.
routing_number
required string. Routing number format. Specified in FedACH database defined by the US Federal Reserve.
address

optional object.

city
optional string. City of the person or business.
line2
optional string. Second line of the address for the person or business.
line1
optional string. Street address of the person or business.
state
optional string. State of the person or business.
postal_code
optional string. Postal code/zip code of the person or business.
country_code
optional string. Two character country code.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id

Balanced::BankAccount.associate_to_customer

balanced.Card().associate_to_customer()

balanced.get().associate_to_customer()

BankAccount().associateToCustomer(Customer customer)

Balanced\BankAccout->associateToCustomer()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/bank_accounts/BA4hsJuMGxKhbUSZ34pQJgE0 \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "customer=/customers/CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.fetch("/bank_accounts/BA6S1rsNWTCwBugJqjBNQbJU")
bank_account.associate_to_customer("/customers/CU6Puxkmu24SfVbY0oi1fPLw")

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

card = balanced.Card.fetch('/bank_accounts/BA6bLGpQZPOiTNRxF24rMd9m')
card.associate_to_customer('/customers/CU64R7DS6DwuXYVg9RTskFK8')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/bank_accounts/BA4hsJuMGxKhbUSZ34pQJgE0')
    .associate_to_customer('/customers/CU4fnEqSkJ1GtfI9yjBE0lpC')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Customer customer = new Customer("/customers/CU4EeI9UPzRcOo2C3j1qFjQj");
BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/bank_accounts/BA4JCiiAb4alhWMlZSv9POAU");

bankAccount.associateToCustomer(customer);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/bank_accounts/BA3BkV8D5D77J22Ktzx8lyI0");
$bank_account->associateToCustomer("/customers/CU3veCwC1nqk9GV6dfSkRHRS");

?>
